tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Pediatric Tooth Extraction,Pediatric Dentistry,
review:
I recently accompanied my mother to Dr.Shilpa’s dental clinic, and I am delighted to share our exceptional experience. 

Dr. Shilpa took time to listen attentively to my mother's concerns, thoroughly explaining the necessary procedures and treatment options, as my mother is very scared about any dental issues and this time she had to go through root canal treatment for two teeth. Doctor’s gentle and patient approach truly put my mother at ease, alleviating any dental anxiety she had. 

What sets Dr. Shilpa apart is her exceptional level of care and empathy for her patients. She went above and beyond to make my mother feel comfortable, taking the time to explain each step of the procedure in a way she could easily understand. Her gentle demeanor and reassuring nature created a trusting and supportive environment, which was invaluable to my mother's overall experience. The same great experience earlier also I had when Dr.Shilpa did dental care for my 5 yr old son.

I must also commend the friendly and helpful staff at the clinic. The receptionists were welcoming and accommodating, ensuring smooth appointment scheduling and assisting with any administrative needs. 

In conclusion, I wholeheartedly recommend Dr.Shilpa for exceptional dental care, particularly for those seeking a compassionate and gentle approach. Dr. Shilpa’s expertise, professionalism, and genuine care for their patients truly exceeded our expectations. My mother's and son’s dental journey was made comfortable and stress-free, and we are grateful for the exceptional service we received. Thanks a lot, Dr. Shilpa.
reply_text:
Your words truly motivate me and my team to continue delivering the highest standard of dental care. It's an honor to be entrusted with your oral health, and I'm grateful for the opportunity to make a positive difference in your life.Once again, thank you for your support and kind words. We look forward to serving you in the future
 Regards  :dr  Shilpa

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dear Dr. Ms.Shilpa,

I, just wanted to take a moment to express my gratitude and appreciation for your exceptional service during my family's, recent  visit to your Dental clinic.

From the moment we stepped into the Clinic, your staff and your goodself greeted us with a warm smile and a friendly demeanor.  You took the time to listen to my family's needs and provided them with the right  suggestion and recommendations.  I appreciate how knowledgeable you are with  the dental service  and your willingness to answer all our queries. 

Your patience and professionalism were evident as you took us  through the treatment features and we never felt the pain or pressure to undergo treatment.  You made the whole process easy and satisfaction and I couldn't have asked for a betterment treatment. 

Your enthusiasm and commitment to provide excellent services to patient  are truly commendable. You went above and beyond to ensure that we were satisfied with the treatment  and are grateful for your efforts. 

We want to thank you once again for your outstanding service and we definitely recommend your Clinic to our family and friends. 

'A person, who wipes the tears and removes the pain of a suffering soul, is said to be a "Divine".                       Dr. Ms. Shilpa, you rightly deserve this honour. You are a Blessing to the neighbourhood and wish you all the best in your future endeavours. 

Regards,

PATRICK***********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental X-Ray,Dental Cavities,Dental Fillings,Dental Cavity Filling,Dental Crowns,
review: Doctor Shilpa was very quick and perfect in gaining the confidence of my kid (5.5 yrs) and was able to treat her with no hiccups. My kid was really very comfortable during her treatment and was well responding to suggestions from doctor. (I thought this would be the toughest part to get her treated for cavities and other issues ) Doctor explained the problem in much professional way and advised the various approaches to save my kids teeth. Doctor was very helpful in making me understand  overview of the problem and in choosing the right solution for my kid. The cleanliness and hygiene procedures adopted in the clinic are highly appreciable during this Covid19 pandemic situation.  UV Sterilization chamber takes care of their surgical equipment's for its hygiene and their staff was well trained in taking care of the treatment chair and other areas for its hygiene. Overall my daughter got the required treatment within time and it was a great experience overall. Once again A very BIG THANKS to doctor Shilpa for all her empathetic gestures and nice treatment to my kid.

went to this doctor for my 2 year old toddler’s cavity pain. such an experienced doctor!!! very considerate about my daughter’s age was talking to her and distracting her and finished cleaning and filling the cavities within 1minute. **** ********* ******* * **** *********** ** **** felt very genuine and reliable even in this era.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had selected Dental 32 from practo reviews and user experiences.
Was having unbearable pain in tooth for last 1 week. Had a very helpful Whatsapp discussion with doctor before visit to clinic itself.
On arriving at clinic, was immediately attended and also given a pain killer to soothe my pain. Next day I had my Root canal in a single sitting in 20 mins.
Really shocked and surprised as it was not my first RCT.
But really the pain was gone forever , within a week my crown was also placed and all is fine now after a month also.
My honest feedback is I have got myself treated for dental problems with almost a dozen dental centres, corporate chains etc and even have got multiple root canals and crowns done.
But Dental 32 is THE BEST AND RELIABLE.
Utmost care is given based on patient problems and treatment advised.
********** - 10 STARS.

Thank you doctor

review: Dr Shilpa is like a blessing for the tooth concerns our son had. We visited her for one concern but she figured root cause for the same. She analyzed and suggested solution for long term over cosmetic and short term solutions. Our son has been doing great since then. His confidence and overall charm is way higher than when we first visited her. All thanks to the doctor for such patience, kindness and friendly behavior towards kids. Our son was very comfortable with doctor in first instance and cooperated very well. Nonetheless, her knowledge and smile is limitless and can definitely fix your smile too. Strongly recommend her.
reply_text:
Once again, we sincerely appreciate your feedback and thank you for choosing our clinic. We look forward to serving you in the future and continuing to meet your dental care needs 
thank u dr Shilpa dental 32

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Shilpa was always highly spoken about and hence I took my mother who had multiple issues with l her teeth.
Within no time did Dr Shilpa ensure the initial diagnosis was done and also suggested permanent fix for the issues.

With just 2 sittings doctor had multiple RCTs done both left and right side along with placing a bridge which is so perfect that my mother who is a senior citizen is all smiles now.

Thank you doctor Shilpa for being professional and friendly and making us feel at ease and i would recommend Dr. SHILPA for timely, painfree and hassle free treatment!

review:
I would highly recommend Dental 32 to anyone staying in that vicinity ..Doctors are very friendly and always with a smile . I was initially worried about getting a RCT done but the doctors there made me feel so comfortable and it was a painless process altogether.
I was also worried about visiting a dental due to the current pandemic but here at Dental 32 , they followed all the precautions and the clinic is very hygienic. I made the right decision choosing Dental 32

The dentist couple did a great job 😊 Thank you for making me feel at ease

review: I got referred to dr.Shilpa for urgent treatment for my son's broken front teeth. Entire experience was absolutely amazing. My child is 9. The entire process was wonderful. There was no rush, Doctor has amazing approach towards children. I was so worried how we will be able to handle my son but Dr.Shilpa made entire process extremely easy.  Nevertheless, the front teeth got rebuilt so beautifully that now it's just a bad memory. You cannot make a difference. Also, we have been instructed in details on what to watch out during next month. I truly can rate entire experience as 10/10. Last but not least, treatment was very affordable. Thank you very much!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
The doctor was in too much hurry to finish. *** ******** ********** *** ********** ******** *** didn't even wait for it to take effect and started with the tooth extraction. My daughter who was already scared about the whole tooth extraction thing underwent a lot of pain this time.

Pedodontists are supposed to have lots of patience while dealing with kids, but I guess this is not one of her strong suits. 

Post the extraction our daughter asked us why we didn't go to the previous place ****** ****** * ************ ***** for her tooth extraction this time coz she didn't feel any pain that time.

tags: Wait time,
review:
Firstly, I noticed that the waiting time during my visit was significantly longer than anticipated. I understand that delays can occur due to unforeseen circumstances, but the extended waiting period without any updates or communication was frustrating. It would be beneficial to streamline the scheduling process or implement better communication systems to ensure patients are informed of any delays and provided with estimated wait times.

Secondly, I observed some issues with the receptionist’s management of patients. The receptionist appeared overwhelmed and disorganized, leading to confusion and delays in the check-in process. There were instances where patients were left waiting for extended periods without any acknowledgment or guidance. Improving the receptionist’s efficiency and communication skills would greatly enhance the overall patient experience.
reply_text: Sorry  for the inconvenience  vl take ur advise abd improve our staff skills and managing sir

review:
I was super nervous and had so many thoughts running in my head but then when I spoke to Dr Shilpa she listened to me so attentively and understood how nervous I was without even me uttering a word.. she is such a beautiful soul who calmly explained me everything about the procedures, she gave me options as and her expertise advice on what’s best for me… she was so kind that helped me breakdown that shell of my nervousness, * ***** *** **** **** ** *** **** ****** ****** **** * ********
If you are a over thinker like me and want to have your dental checkup this is the place!
Thank you Dr Shilpa and Dr Santosh for being so kind and caring 🤗

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited the doc to get my 3yr old treated. Dr.shilpa explained everything in detail, made my kid feel comfortable(though initially she was scared) and gave us the  treatment plan. She considered both our freetime and her availability to get the procedure done and she performed the procedure so well ensuring that the kid also gets ample time to relax considering the kids age. She is an excellent dentist. Very patient and understanding. I would recommend her to anybody be it an adult or a kid if they have a dental problem.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I got front teeth filled for my 9 year old daughter by pediatric dentist Shilpa. The observations are:1. While filling the teeth, multiple teeth got stuck together with the composite material. Now I plan to meet another doctor to correct the issue.2. My kid's inner gums and skins got burnt by the UV rays she used, after filling the teeth she keep complaint about the burning feel.3. After teeth got filled, all over the mouth and teeth that composite material got stuck, could see many uneven texture in the teeth.After saying these issues to the doctor, she asked me to visit the clinic for correction. I am really scared to go now, ******* * ** **** **** ** *** **** ** ***************** *** **** ******* *** ****** ***** ** ***** So I plan to visit other pediatric dentist.I don't suggest Dr Shilpa *** ********* **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Shilpa and Dr. Santosh are really amazing doctors. Dr. Ships listened to me and was sympathetic and very understanding. They both were really patient and reassuring all through the procedure. My broken teeth that had to be extracted, was done with great care. The procedure was painless and the doctors kept on reassuring me that everything will be fine.Post extraction care was carefully explained. They even gave a copy of the "instructions after extraction", so that the recovery is painless.  I still have some more procedures be completed. But so far I'm really impressed and totally happy with their concern and care. With the two doctors you are in good hands.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Excellent interpersonal skills.
Reassuring for the patient .
Doctor cleared all doubts and explained all the options .

Two fillings cost about 1500 rupees. That plus X-ray and consultation was INR 2000. Also, there was no glass or anything at the basin where I was asked to rinse out my mouth after the fillings. The process of the fillings themselves - water splashed on my chin and my arm. Nobody bothered to offer even tissues. I’d not go back here because the whole process was uncomfortable even though the doctor tried to be friendly.
